input.sentences: [female] had waited many years to get married to her true love | [male] .
[male] was nervous | and joked around with [female] 's father before the wedding .
when the two were joined in matrimony | it was an amazing moment .
everyone was thrilled to see them walk down the aisle .
they headed out after a short time to their honeymoon | very much in love .
output.sentences: She waited and married her true love.
The nervous groom waits for the wedding to start.
Finally the moment where they are joined in matrimony.
As the couple walked down the isle, the guest were thrilled for them.
Although they knew each other a short time, they knew it was true love.
